title: I think I'm going to start a thread to write down all the stupid stuff I hear in solo queue
body:
Such as

"I targeted the support because he's less mobile" - Ez after asking why he didn't target the flashless Lucian that had E'd in.

or

"If you had taken exhaust..." - Vayne that proceeded to chase the enemy support while Jinx stood attacking her literally an arms length away.

And my most recent 

"Diana was made to be a jungler" - Diana annoyed that Riven who had picked before her was going to jungle.
